adrFormatAddress: 38 8th Ave, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
The HYPE IS REAL! Everything about this restaurant is that and more.

Spicy Rigatoni A La Vodka is s must and to die for but everything on the menu is also top notch.

Service here is impeccable and best part is the lively 70’s & 80’s music. It’s not the norm for an Italian restaurant but heck it works.

A true social media sensation, and you must come and experience it for yourself.

originalText.text: A wonderful Italian cuisine. The pasta dishes are HUGE! So don’t hungry. Place has a classic New York Italian feel. Great vibes and delicious food. The La Vodka pasta is a must!! We walked in mid afternoon and didn’t need to make reservations.

text.text: A wonderful Italian cuisine. The pasta dishes are HUGE! So don’t hungry. Place has a classic New York Italian feel. Great vibes and delicious food. The La Vodka pasta is a must!! We walked in mid afternoon and didn’t need to make reservations.

originalText.text: Had dinner last night with family and they were able to squeeze us four in at 6pm at a nice little outside table with a warm heater. Jorge was our server and he was great and super helpful. The food came out quickly and everything was super tasty. The manager also checked in on us frequently and was knowledgeable and so kind. He even sent us some cannolis!!! The bathroom situation was a bit tough as there was only one in the basement but it’s New York! Also, I wish they had angel hair!!! Otherwise a great experience.

text.text: Had dinner last night with family and they were able to squeeze us four in at 6pm at a nice little outside table with a warm heater. Jorge was our server and he was great and super helpful. The food came out quickly and everything was super tasty. The manager also checked in on us frequently and was knowledgeable and so kind. He even sent us some cannolis!!! The bathroom situation was a bit tough as there was only one in the basement but it’s New York! Also, I wish they had angel hair!!! Otherwise a great experience.

originalText.text: Great vibes in a great location but the food is just okay. We had the eggplant stack, the fried mozzarella, the rigatoni alla vodka, the macaroni alla tartufo and the gelato for dessert. The eggplant stack and the gelato were really good. Everything else was okay, and I think I feel more disappointed only because I heard really great things about this place. Especially the rigatoni which I felt was a bit over hyped. Overall food was okay/good but way overpriced. The vibe is what makes this place special.

text.text: Great vibes in a great location but the food is just okay. We had the eggplant stack, the fried mozzarella, the rigatoni alla vodka, the macaroni alla tartufo and the gelato for dessert. The eggplant stack and the gelato were really good. Everything else was okay, and I think I feel more disappointed only because I heard really great things about this place. Especially the rigatoni which I felt was a bit over hyped. Overall food was okay/good but way overpriced. The vibe is what makes this place special.

originalText.text:
5 STARS ALL ACROSS THE BOARD!

I made a reservation for 4 on a Saturday afternoon around 4:45pm. Reservations are highly recommended so make sure you make one on the Resy app. When we arrived, our table wasn't ready yet which was okay since we were defrosting, haha!

Upon walking in, this restaurant is intimate, cozy and dimly lit. Perfect for date night or a meet up with friends. Since we were waiting a bit over 10 minutes, the manager gave us free glasses of champagne which I thought was nice! Shortly after, we were seated.

Since I've wanted to visit for a while, I already knew what I was ordering. But let's get into the apps and drinks. They give you complimentary bread and dip while you browse through the menu. There was a special for their fried mozzarella trio which comes with 3 sauces (pesto, marinara, vodka). I love how we were able to try different sauces. For the drinks, I love a good spritz so I had to order the limoncello spritz. It was light and refreshing! For my entrée, of course I had to order the spicy rigatoni alla vodka and boy was it GOOD! The cheese, the sauce and seasoning went together perfectly. This spot has become my #1 for spicy rigatoni alla vodka! SO glad I took my leftovers home because it was just as good. My boyfriend ordered their chicken parm and devoured every bite on his plate. He said it was the best he's had as well.

All in all, service was amazing, food was finger licking good and Arthur and Sons will definitely see us again!
